name: Have a bowl mr squidward THE GAME
name_original: Have a bowl mr squidward THE GAME
description:
MR SQUIDWARD!

How to play:  control squidward with the arrow keys. mr krabs will throw bowls at you. make sure you dodge the bowls. the green bowls are good. touch the green bowl to throw it back at mr krabs. hit him 5 times to win.  TIP: hold down the arrow keys to run
